item.title: One of the fastest-spinning stars in the Universe
item.description: New research in our Milky Way has revealed a neutron star that rotates around its axis at an extremely high speed. It spins 716 times per second, maki...

item.title: A remarkable fossil assemblage gets a new interpretation

item.title: Low-level lead poisoning is still pervasive in the US and globally

item.title: Sounding the alarm: Fire's speed is more threatening than its size

item.title: It's not to be. Universe too short for Shakespeare typing monkeys
item.description: It would take far longer than the lifespan of our universe for a typing monkey to randomly produce Shakespeare, a new study reveals.
